channel.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
channel.description: I click rune server and it says: Godpure V2 is now online ~~~ W00T!!! but i try to register it on the mopar server status page and it says: Cantonscape is offline to register it needs to be online anyone got any ideas???? - thanks nicktheman75, future owner of cantonscape! :)

item.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

I have the same problem, Using wireless as well, what does wireless have to do with it ?I have been trying to make a server and get it online but it wont let me, i have PF and everything else,

Read full topic

use uTorrent. Portforwarding with a router gets you pissed 99% of the time.

item.source: I run the server but its still offline to others?

item.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Saurus Owner Saurus
item.description:
@Owner_Saurus wrote:

You can Portforward if you have a router

If you don’t have a router go to No-ip.com and make a host then download client and check it then ppl log in that. You can download hamachi and make a network, then ppl join your network and they login through your ip shown at the top like 5.243.533.35 (random ip)Something like that. Well thats all i know GL

Read full topic

item.source: I run the server but its still offline to others?

item.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
item.dc:creator: @digistr digistr
item.description:
@digistr wrote:

make sure no-ip is updated.

make sure in firewall your allowing the port.

make sure you port forwarded with server ip and port that your using.

make sure you have jdk

make sure the clients loading to your server ip not localhost.

Read full topic
item.source: I run the server but its still offline to others?

item.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
item.dc:creator: @mustbaj mustbaj
item.description:
@mustbaj wrote:

Sometimes certain isp’s wont let you have a server. I use to have qwest dsl and i could host or use my ip for anything. But then i got comcast and now i can. so call your isp to see if you can host a server.

Read full topic

item.title: I run the server but its still offline to others?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:
